citation_details.title: They look virtually the same: extraretinal representation of symmetry in virtual reality
citation_details.author: E Karakashevska, M Batterley, Y Yao, ADJ Makin
citation_details.abstract: The brain must identify objects from different viewpoints that change the retinal image. This  study examined the conditions under which the brain spends computational resources to
citation_details.short_author: E Karakashevska, M Batterley, Y Yao, ADJ Makin
